short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See a new piece of art every time you open a tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open a new tab and see a piece of art from a museum collection.

This extension incorporates the collection from the Metropolitan Museum of Art, the Cleveland Museum of Art and the Art Institute of Chicago.

This extension examines the browser tab as a possible method of cultural engagement. From delivering open access artwork images to providing a space for curatorial commissions, the browser extension has a lot of potential in the cultural sector.
